dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A massive, one-point-one billion dollar investment is about to completely transform the skyline around Nursultan Nazarbayev International Airport.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A massive, one-point-one billion dollar investment is about to completely transform the skyline around Nursultan Nazarbayev International Airport.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Transport, under a long-term investment agreement between the ministry and Terminals Astana Airport Limited (part of Terminals Holding, UAE), $1.1 billion will be invested into the modernization of the airport and the development of an innovative infrastructure complex known as an aerotropolis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a huge deal. And they're not just upgrading the airport; they're building this whole new concept called an aerotropolis around it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a huge deal. And they're not just upgrading the airport; they're building this whole new concept called an aerotropolis around it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Transport, under a long-term investment agreement between the ministry and Terminals Astana Airport Limited (part of Terminals Holding, UAE), $1.1 billion will be invested into the modernization of the airport and the development of an innovative infrastructure complex known as an aerotropolis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, an aerotropolis. Which, uh, the ministry described as this integrated complex with logistics zones, hotels, even business clusters all connected to the airport itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, an aerotropolis. Which, uh, the ministry described as this integrated complex with logistics zones, hotels, even business clusters all connected to the airport itself.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As explained by the ministry, an aerotropolis is a multifunctional complex that integrates an airport with logistics and industrial zones, hotels, retail and office centers, and business clusters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's like building a whole new mini-city designed entirely around air travel and commerce. President Tokayev had actually ordered the development of an international air hub just back in January.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like building a whole new mini-city designed entirely around air travel and commerce. President Tokayev had actually ordered the development of an international air hub just back in January.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In late January, President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev ordered the urgent development of an international air hub in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And this is part of a bigger plan, right? They want to develop these hubs at six airports across Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this is part of a bigger plan, right? They want to develop these hubs at six airports across Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Transport later announced plans to develop air hubs at six airports across the country, including Astana's.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. So for Astana, the first stage involves some serious constructionâ€”a second runway, a whole new third passenger terminal, and a modern cargo terminal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. So for Astana, the first stage involves some serious construction-a second runway, a whole new third passenger terminal, and a modern cargo terminal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of the agreement, the first stage of the project will include the construction of a second runway, a third passenger terminal, and a modern cargo terminal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just bricks and mortar. The investor, Terminals Astana Airport Limited from the UAE, is also bringing in digital solutions and automation, plus they're committing to train all the staff to international standards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just bricks and mortar. The investor, Terminals Astana Airport Limited from the U A E, is also bringing in digital solutions and automation, plus they're committing to train all the staff to international standards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The investor will upgrade the airport's special equipment fleet, implement digital solutions and automation systems, and carry out phased training and professional development of airport personnel. All staff will undergo certified training that meets international aviation standards, the Ministry of Transport said in a statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That certified training part is crucial. It means they're thinking long-term about quality and safety, not just slapping up new buildings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That certified training part is crucial. It means they're thinking long-term about quality and safety, not just slapping up new buildings.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The agreement was actually finalized on May 12th after talks between President Tokayev and the Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The agreement was actually finalized on May twelfth after talks between President Tokayev and the Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 12, following talks between President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev and the Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi, Sheikh Khaled bin Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, a signing ceremony was held for a number of bilateral documents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So this is a major bilateral project, really putting Kazakhstan on the map as a regional aviation hub.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this is a major bilateral project, really putting Kazakhstan on the map as a regional aviation hub.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And creating thousands of jobs in the process. It's a huge step for the country's infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And creating thousands of jobs in the process. It's a huge step for the country's infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such infrastructure solutions typically enhance regional connectivity and create thousands of jobs.
